item.title: Entra Permissions Management Podcast
item.description: The Microsoft 425Show I recently had the privilege to be on The Microsoft 425Show, a Microsoft security chat show. The topic of the podcast was Entra Permissions Management: Partner Perspectives. I had a great time talking with co-workers and with Shannon Kuehn a Senior Product Manager in the Identity product group at Microsoft. You can access the show podcast from this link Entra Permissions Management: Partner Perspectives or stick around and listen below.
